name: rainbow-wing
effect: Causes ho oh to appear at the top of bell tower.
short_effect: Summons Ho-Oh at the top of the Bell Tower.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A mystical rainbow feather that sparkles.

flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A mystical rainbow feather that sparkles.
